title: Exposed and Pleasured
description: Book store owner Kim Baker has a serious crush on Dr. Blake Morgan--an attraction that only gets stronger when he shows her an erotic book and invites her on a night of sensual exploration at his private club, the Society.She's drawn to his sense of power and dominant sexuality...and can't help but fantasize about being controlled by him in every way. But as Blake teaches Kim to claim her pleasure and lose her inhibitions, he may be the one in danger of losing control....Book three of The Masters series.
author: Lisa Renee Jones
